cu.explanation_en: Setting the number of PUSCH threads to 0 will cause thread allocation failure and prevent uplink processing.

du.explanation_en: Setting the PDSCH antenna ports XP to an out-of-range value of 8 will cause antenna configuration errors and prevent downlink transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PDSCH 天線埠 XP 設定為超出範圍的值 8，會導致天線配置錯誤，並阻止下行鏈路傳輸。
